Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke

Cheech & Chong Water Pipe

A2062

Log in for pricing
Its been over 40 years since the Grammy award-winning duo first released Up in Smoke. The lovable icons are the most well-known smokers and brought stoner-comedy to the big screen. Cheech and Chong have been making people laugh and light up for years, join in with their line of Up in Smoke glass and smoking accessories collection.

Specifications
  • High-quality borosilicate glass
  • Beaker base design
  • 18.8mm ground joint
  • Inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm slitted diffuser
  • Ideal downstem length: 14 cm / 5.5 inches
  • 14.5mm male herb bowl with handle
  • Rimmed mouthpiece
  • Black glass accents on mouthpiece and bowl
  • Ice notches
  • Decorated with Cheech & Chongs Up In Smoke decal

The Cheech & Chong water pipe is made from thick, handblown borosilicate glass. Sitting 12 tall with a wide beaker base this piece has a large water reservoir. It features an 18.8mm ground joint and comes with a removable, slitted inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm diffuser downstem and a 14.5mm male herb bowl with glass handle for easy lifting. The Cheech & Chong comes equipped with an ice catcher, which gives you the option of adding ice to make your hit extra chilly. This mainly clear piece is adorned with a coloured accent on the mouthpiece and bowl handle to match the iconic Up in Smoke imagery on the side.

5.5 Hourglass Base Water Pipe

A5915MT

Log in for pricing

Handcrafted from the highest quality thick borosilicate glass, our compact 5.5 Hourglass Base Water Pipe provides impressive, ultra-smooth hits in a small and discrete package.

  • Thick Borosilicate Glass
  • Bent Neck
  • Flat Base
  • Showerhead Percolator
  • Accented Mouthpiece
  • Removable Glass Bowl

This compact and discrete dry herb bong has an efficient, straightforward design that is both elegant and highly functional. It featured a flat base for added stability and a bent neck for ease of use. The built-in showerhead percolator will ensure that you are receiving some of the smoothest hits possible. Thick, high-quality glass and removable bowl makes this bong a breeze to clean and maintain. With proper care, it will last for years to come.

If youre looking for a compact and discrete bong that can still provide big, smooth hits with ease, then the 5.5 Bubble Base Water Pipe will make a perfect addition to your collection!

Famous X

FAMOUS X 12 IN BEAKER WATER PIPE

A2074

Log in for pricing

Handcrafted from the highest quality thick borosilicate glass, our 12" water pipes feature a slitted downstem for smooth diffusion and easy removable cleaning.

  • High-quality borosilicate glass
  • Beaker base
  • 18.8mm ground joint
  • Inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm slitted diffuser
  • Clear 14.5mm herb bowl with handle
  • Ideal downstem length: 13.5 cm / 4.3 inches
  • Ice notches
  • No carb hole
  • Black accents on the mouthpiece and bowl

The Famous Beaker is handcrafted from the finest borosilicate glass that is able to withstand the test of time, all delivered, safely stored, in their own matching custom box.

This basic, yet elegant beaker base ice bong is extremely easy to clean and maintain. It features a removable slitted inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm downstem and ice notches, for optimal filtration with a frosty touch.

The beaker comes delivered with a male 14.5mm herb bowl with a handle. The handle not only makes it easy to lift the bowl, without the risk of burning your fingers, but it doubles as a roll stopper as well.

So if you are on the lookout for a solid beaker ice bong with a special touch to add to your glass collection, you have found your perfect match.

Diffuser Type Slit
Joint Size 18.8 mm > 14.5 mm
Glass Thickness 4.0 mm
Height 30.5 cm / 12 inches
Material Glass
Color clear

Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke

CHEECH & CHONG PEDRO 8 IN BEAKER WATER PIPE

A2017W

Log in for pricing
Its been over 40 years since the Grammy award-winning duo first released Up in Smoke. The lovable icons are the most well-known smokers and brought stoner-comedy to the big screen. Cheech and Chong have been making people laugh and light up for years, join in with their line of Up in Smoke glass and smoking accessories collection.


Specifications
  • High-quality borosilicate glass
  • Perfect for dry herbs
  • Stable beaker base
  • Built-in showerhead diffuser downstem
  • 14.5mm female joint
  • 14.5mm male herb bowl
  • Straight neck
  • Rimmed mouthpiece
  • Decorated with Cheech & Chong's decal

This Pedro bong is made from handblown, borosilicate glass with a reinforced thick base. It features a male 14.5mm herb bowl that fits with the female 14.5mm connection joint. This little beaker sits 8.25" tall, making it the perfect size for a portable or stationary setup. Pedro is equipped with a fixed downstem that ends with a showerhead percolator. This helps break up the smoke and makes your hit super smooth. It's adorned with colour accents on the mouthpiece, base, percolator and bowl handle that matches the iconic Up in Smoke imagery on the side of the piece.

Monster Mask Globe Tube

AA1003RA

Log in for pricing

The bong simply pushes into the mask. When worn, the mask creates an airtight seal around your face, so as you inhale the mask fills up with smoke for the ultimate hit. For use with tobacco or one of these herbal blends. The bong can be filled with water or can be used without. Either way there is also a carb hole at the back of the bong in order to increase the intensity of the hit. Bong available in 5 different colors.
